dmca.title: Drag City wants link dragged off Digg
dmca.body: Digg Support Team, We feel that we've met the requirements. If you do not take the link down right away, we will be forced to take legal action. Every other site has complied with our request and we are losing tons of money ever hour that this link remains active. Please take this down immediately. http://digg.com/music/Bonnie_Prince_Billy_Lie_Down_In_The_Light_2008_Download Best, [private] --- May 22, 2008 Dear Digg Support Team, Let this serve as notice that you must have the following material removed: DC367CD/LP Bonnie "Prince" Billy Lie Down In The Light The link to be removed is here: http://digg.com/music/Bonnie_Prince_Billy_Lie_Down_In_The_Light_2008_Download This link contains the full album of Drag City Catalog # DC367 CD/LP (Released May 20th, 2008): 1. Easy Does It 2. You Remind Me of Something (The Glory Goes) 3. So Everyone 4. For Every Field There's A Mole 5. Keep Eye On Other's Gain 6. You Want That Picture 7. Missing One 8. What's Missing Is 9. Where Is The Puzzle? 10. Lie Down In The Light 11. Willow Trees Bend 12. I'll Be Glad All songs are copyright 2008 Drag City Incorporated and Royal Stable Music (ASCAP). All songs are composed by WIll Oldham, whom we represent. There is no reason that this copyrighted work should be available in this manner. I can guarantee that I am representing Will Oldham and Drag City Inc. in these affairs. Please help us out and have this taken down. Regards, [signed] [private] PRODUCTION/LICENSING DRAG CITY
